Name: mri_average outputs

GeneratedBy.Name: mri_average
GeneratedBy.Description: Multiple runs of the same flip angle contrast, averaged together using FreeSurfer's mri_average command. Further description of this command can be found here: https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/ExvivoRecons?highlight=%28average%29

Description: This is a dataset from a Variable Flip Angle (VFA) scan which collected multiple runs of the same flip angle contrast. These runs were averaged together to create a single volume.
